title: Process
subtitle: Comprehensive
description: Discover your real biological age and add years of healthy life in just 5 steps: scientific biomarker analysis + personalized longevity plan + results interpretation and action plan. Your healthier future starts today.

step1.title: Configure
step1.description: Select your personalized Essential package and add specialized modules (Add-Ons) that best fit your health and longevity goals

step2.title: Extraction
step2.description: Visit any of our more than 50 extraction points distributed throughout Spain. Quick and comfortable process with specialized professionals

step3.title: Analysis
step3.description: Your samples are processed in ISO 15189 certified laboratories with cutting-edge technology and the highest international quality standards

step4.title: Results
step4.description: Receive your complete report with detailed biomarker analysis, biological age calculation and personalized specific recommendations

step5.title: Consultation
step5.description: Personalized session with our Health Coach to interpret results and design your specific longevity action plan

timeNote: * Times may vary depending on selected Add-Ons
certifiedQualityDesc: ISO 15189 laboratories and internationally validated processes
extractionNetworkDesc: More than 50 extraction points for maximum comfort and accessibility
healthCoachDesc: Personalized consultation to interpret results and design your specific plan.
gdprComplianceDesc: Complete protection of personal data according to European GDPR regulations
